mapper.insert: insert into inquiry_board_tbl values (#{inquiryBoardNo}, #{inquiryBoardTitle}, #{inquiryBoardWriter}, #{inquiryBoardContent}, #{inquiryBoardOption}, #{inquiryBoardStatus}, #{adminComment}, #{inquiryPassword}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), null)
mapper.select: select count(*) from inquiry_board_tbl where inquiry_board_status = 1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b. * from (select inquiry_board_no, inquiry_board_title, inquiry_board_writer, inquiry_board_content, inquiry_board_option, inquiry_board_status, admin_comment, admin_comment_date as admin_comment_date, inquiry_password, inquiry_board_date from inquiry_board_tbl order by inquiry_board_no asc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update inquiry_board_tbl set admin_comment = #{adminComment}, admin_comment_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') where inquiry_board_no = #{inquiryBoardNo}
